text: You open TikTok and start filming. Your hair is greasy, your partner is crumpled on the floor behind you, and you’re pretty sure someone just projectile vomited off-screen.
The video goes viral within an hour. Comments flood in:
Even a nurse anonymously messages you: 'That place is hell. Get out if you can.'

choices.text: 💪 Inspired, you decide to advocate harder for yourself.
📉 Overwhelmed, you start doomscrolling and dissociating.
🛑 Sign off and cry quietly into your hoodie.
